data.instruction: Invite a biz member, assign an operational role, and verify that member can authenticate into the same biz.
data.expectedResult: Biz member account/session exists with scoped role permissions.

requestBody.failureMessage: owner-configure-demand-pricing: Demand pricing capability is not exposed as API tools yet.

resultPayload.note: Step blocked: owner-configure-demand-pricing: Demand pricing capability is not exposed as API tools yet.

evidence.error: owner-configure-demand-pricing: Demand pricing capability is not exposed as API tools yet.

data.instruction: Set demand pricing rules (for example peak-hour/holiday overrides) and verify they can be applied to bookable offers.
data.expectedResult: Demand pricing policy exists and can influence offer/booking totals.
data.failureMessage: owner-configure-demand-pricing: Demand pricing capability is not exposed as API tools yet.

resultPayload.note: Step blocked: owner-configure-demand-pricing: Demand pricing capability is not exposed as API tools yet.

evidence.error: owner-configure-demand-pricing: Demand pricing capability is not exposed as API tools yet.

data.instruction: Create an offer representing the UC primary service; choose execution mode matching the scenario.
data.expectedResult: Offer is created in draft state with captured id.

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Dynamic/Surge Pricing. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

resultPayload.note: Pricing baseline configured on biz metadata.

data.instruction: Configure pricing defaults for the offer lifecycle including call fees/manual surge if UC needs imply it.
data.expectedResult: Pricing model persists and future bookings can calculate totals deterministically.

resultPayload.note: Pricing baseline configured on biz metadata.
